description: Built to take on the worst downpours, the Stormline Stretch Rain Shell is their fully featured rain shell. By combining their BD.dry™ waterproof/breathable/windproof technology with a full feature set and stretch fabric, the Stormline provides reliable protection when the weather breaks.
name: Black Diamond Stormline Stretch Rain Shell - Mens

specs.value: BD.dry™ 2.5L, Two-way stretch woven face with DWR finish -100% Nylon
